entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
